trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_SEQ_00<tab>Wuk Lamat is eager to attempt the next feat.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat and have her accompany you.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Ropli while Wuk Lamat is accompanying you.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_TODO_02<tab>Search for Fonjeantaine.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.

TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ALPHINAUD_000_001<tab>I have not forgotten our obligations to Wuk Lamat, but it's moments like these─when we can immerse ourselves in the cultures of others─that fill me with anticipation for the new experiences this adventure will bring us.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>We've made a good start on these challenges. Hopefully we can keep it up.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_KRILE_000_010<tab>In a contest like this one, 'tis only a matter of time until the claimants are pitted against each other in direct competition.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ERENVILLE_000_015<tab>Traveling with so large and diverse a group is...unfamiliar to me. If she could see me now...
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_020<tab>We've now won keystones from both the Feat of Reeds and the Feat of Gold. Surely that means our approach to the contest was the right one?
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>So it would seem. By continuing to retrace Gulool Ja Ja's journey as presented in the saga, we should find the remaining electors in turn.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_022<tab>Then let's visit the giants next! Like Krile said, the fact that they were searching for the golden city might mean they know something useful.

TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ERENVILLE_000_023<tab>The home of the Yok Huy is in the upper reaches of Urqopacha. Unless you're keen on scaling the cliffs, we'll have to take the long way around─through Kozama'uka.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ERENVILLE_000_024<tab>This route will take us close to the Moblin village...which is another important location in the saga.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ERENVILLE_000_025<tab>Since we'll need all the keystones eventually, it makes sense to pay them a visit while we're passing through.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_026<tab>So we call on the Moblins first, then. Let's head there right now!
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ERENVILLE_000_027<tab>I'm afraid “right now” is going to be a problem...
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ERENVILLE_000_028<tab>The Flight of We Wingless, the great stairs leading to the Moblin settlement, collapsed in the storm.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_029<tab>What are we to do, then?
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ERENVILLE_000_030<tab>There is an alternative, but it requires preparation. Until it's ready, you could rest at the cabins or see more of the city. Whatever you prefer.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ERENVILLE_000_031<tab>Just to be sure: you'll accept <var 1A 02 /var>any<var 1A 01 /var> method of travel as long as it gets us to our destination?
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_032<tab>Of course. Who do you take me for?
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ERENVILLE_000_033<tab>...Hmm. Then as your guide, I will see to the arrangements.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ALPHINAUD_000_034<tab>Well, it seems we have some free time on our hands. Let us make the most of it.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_035<tab>I need to get my axe repaired. I nicked the blade pretty badly when I took a swing at Bakool Ja Ja.

TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_036<tab>That reminds me, I never got around to introducing you to Ropli, did I? He's the man in charge of Wachumeqimeqi, and a good person to know. Want to come along?
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_037<tab>Let's go, then!
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_040<tab>Ready? The markets of Wachumeqimeqi are to the east, on the other side of Bayside Bevy.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>Wuk Lamat is now accompanying you. Keep her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_SYSTEM_000_042<tab>You can leave Wuk Lamat behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with her and selecting the option to part ways.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_SYSTEM_000_043<tab>If you wish to have Wuk Lamat accompany you again, return and speak with her at the original location.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_A1_000_001<tab>Talk.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_A1_000_002<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Discuss Aunt Tii's Tacos.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_A1_000_003<tab>Part ways.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_A1_000_004<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_051<tab>Wachumeqimeqi is everything that Tuliyollal was built to be.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_052<tab>This is Aunt Tii's Tacos, named for its owner here, the lovely Tiisol.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_053<tab>If you're after the best tacos in Tuliyollal, this place sits at the top with Xbalyav Ty'e.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_TIISOLJA_000_054<tab>You say that, Third Promise, but you only ever eat old Br'uk Evu's food! Come and buy mine for a change!
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_055<tab>Sorry, Tiisol! It has been a while, hasn't it? I swear I'll stop for a bite once the contest is over.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_SYSTEM_000_056<tab>Are you sure you wish to part ways with your companion?
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_057<tab>Something you eat not agree with you? Well, I'll be waiting by Xbalyav Ty'e whenever you're ready!
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_058<tab>Feeling better? Let's get back to it, then!
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ROPLI_000_059<tab>Apologies, but I'm rather busy at the moment. Please come back later.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_SYSTEM_100_060<tab>You should have Wuk Lamat accompanying you before continuing.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>Wuk Lamat has yet to arrive. Be sure she is at your side before attempting to continue.

TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ROPLI_000_061<tab>My, my, the Third Promise. How might I assist you this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>?
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_062<tab>Well met, Ropli! I need to buff a nasty nick out of my axe blade.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ROPLI_000_063<tab>Yes, it's been chipped quite terribly. Trying to cleave rocks again, were we?
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_064<tab>Er, something like that. Think you can fix it?

TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ROPLI_000_065<tab>You stand among Tural's most prestigious gathering of artisans and ask this question? 'Tis child's play. We'll have it repaired for you in two shakes of an alpaca's tail.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_066<tab>Good to hear! I leave it in your capable hands.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ROPLI_000_067<tab>Who's your companion, if I may ask?
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_068<tab>This is <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, a great adventurer I recruited from across the salt!

TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_069<tab>I brought <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> here to meet you, actually. Thought <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> might have reason to visit Wachumeqimeqi sooner or later.

TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ROPLI_000_070<tab>Then allow me to introduce myself. I am Ropli, humble representative of this grand center of trade. A pleasure to meet you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ROPLI_000_071<tab>You there! Stop dithering in the shadows and announce your business already!
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_072<tab>Hrm, I've seen that man somewhere before...
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_073<tab>A jewelry maker you met on the voyage over?
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_074<tab>Oh, I remember─I spoke with him, too! Fonjean...taine? Yes, that was his name!
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ROPLI_000_075<tab>You've been loitering like a flighty admirer who can't pluck up the courage to confess his feelings. Out with it, then. Why are you here?
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_FONJEANTAINE_000_076<tab>I, uh... That is to say...
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ROPLI_000_077<tab><sigh> And we're no closer to solving that enigma.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_078<tab>Hrm, I wonder if he could use someone to talk to... I say we go and ask! Let me know by linkpearl if you find him first.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_ROPLI_000_080<tab>Our nervous man of mystery fled westwards...never to be seen again?
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_FONJEANTAINE_000_085<tab>You were conversing with Master Ropli... But wait─we've met before, haven't we? On the ship...
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_086<tab>You've found him? Good, I'll be right there!
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_087<tab>Why did you run off like that? Did you have business with Ropli or not?
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_FONJEANTAINE_000_088<tab>Please, you needn't concern yourselves with my affairs! I'm undeserving of such attention!
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_089<tab>Huh? What are you going on about?
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_FONJEANTAINE_000_090<tab>I beg of you, do not ask me to explain! Do not!
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_091<tab>Sorry, but the more you tell me not to, the more curious I become. Besides, you look like you need a friend.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_FONJEANTAINE_000_092<tab><sigh> You are too kind... So be it. I suppose I can share with you a morsel of my misery...

TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_FONJEANTAINE_000_093<tab>Before I came to Tuliyollal, I worked as a goldsmith at the most prestigious jewelry maker in all of Ul'dah─Eshtaime's Aesthetics. Oh, it started off well enough, but as the days passed, everything began to go wrong!

TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_FONJEANTAINE_000_094<tab>Compared to the masterpieces of my talented colleagues, my products were lacking. <var 1A 02 /var>Mediocre<var 1A 01 /var>! I lost all confidence. Crippling doubt had possessed me, and any veneer of bravado I tried to put forth soon cracked beneath its weight!

TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_FONJEANTAINE_000_095<tab>Thus did I take ship, hoping to find a fresh beginning on new shores. Yet as you witnessed, I lack the courage to even approach a potential employer. You stand before a man wallowing in the wreckage of his ill-spent existence!
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_096<tab>Uh...alright, then. You offered a “morsel,” then served us the full course.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_097<tab>You must've <var 1A 02 /var>really<var 1A 01 /var> wanted someone to hear your story. If you like, I could try to give you a few words of advice.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_FONJEANTAINE_000_098<tab>Then...you have experience with my predicament? Of feeling terribly inadequate compared to your undeniably superior peers?
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_099<tab>Well...when you put it that way, I, uh...
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_100<tab>Ah...hahaha, not me! I'm Wuk Lamat, Third Promise of Tuliyollal!
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_101<tab>Daughter of the Dawnservant...
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_FONJEANTAINE_000_102<tab>O-Oh, of course, you're a member of the royal family! Please forgive my presumptuousness!
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_FONJEANTAINE_000_103<tab>But what of you? Have you ever measured your work against that of your colleagues and found yourself wanting...?
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_A2_000_001<tab>You can't measure your worth by the success of others.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_A2_000_002<tab>On occasion.

TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_FONJEANTAINE_000_105<tab>How can I not? Should my work not meet the same exacting standards, no new commissions will be forthcoming! What then was the point of my becoming a goldsmith...?

TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_FONJEANTAINE_100_106<tab>If even an ally handpicked by the Third Promise can feel such doubt, then what hope is there for me? I must question why I bothered to become a goldsmith in the first place...

TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_FONJEANTAINE_000_106<tab>Hmmm... Looking back, 'twas my father who inspired me to take up the trade. His exquisite creations brought radiant smiles to the faces of his clients, and I admired him deeply for it.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_FONJEANTAINE_000_107<tab>But in the course of striving to be as great a goldsmith as him, I lost sight of my original motivation...
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_FONJEANTAINE_000_108<tab>All I ever wanted was to spread joy through my craft, as he did.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_FONJEANTAINE_000_109<tab>Perhaps...perhaps I will give this one last try. Thank you both for reminding me of what is truly important!
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_110<tab>What is truly important...
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_120<tab>...
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_121<tab>Oh, sorry, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I didn't mean to ignore you.
TEXT_KINGMA119_04878_WUKLAMAT_000_122<tab>But, yes─I'm glad to see Fonjeantaine is giving himself another chance!
